segments.text: I'm drawn to the precise movements of the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching in with one hand, delicately pulling out cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand is holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus is absolute, unaware of the precariousness of his perch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands poised, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool legs splayed, a clear sign of instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry that an adult could be so oblivious to this danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any slight shift in weight could send him tumbling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hurting himself fills me with fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash of the plate and the scattered cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The noise would surely alert the woman, but it might be too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little adventure is on the verge of turning into an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the tension in the air around that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
